title: LAP: The Return of the State, New Social Actors, and Post-Neoliberalism in Ecuador
description: Tomas Ocampo, Outreach Coordinator for Latin American Perspectives, interviews issue editor Veronica Silva on the subject of the Special Issue topic: The Return of the State, New Social Actors, and Post-Neoliberalism in Ecuador.
content:encoded: Tomas Ocampo, Outreach Coordinator for Latin American Perspectives, interviews issue editor Veronica Silva on the subject of the Special Issue topic: The Return of the State, New Social Actors, and Post-Neoliberalism in Ecuador.
